title: Concerning Children - primary function of anecdote

content.prompt: The primary function of the anecdote recounted in the fourth and fifth paragraphs (lines 26-41) is to

choices.label: emphasize a point by presenting an absurd example
reinforce readers’ preconceived ideas in order to underscore a truism
present a hypothetical case that challenges the author’s argument
offer a model of etiquette for readers to emulate
